rogel.io.fopl.proof.tree

Class AbstractSolutionNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • rogel.io.fopl.proof.tree.AbstractSolutionNode
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AndSolutionNode, PredicateSolutionNode

    public abstract class AbstractSolutionNode
extends java.lang.Object
    An AbstractSolutionNode is the building-block for logical problem solving. This class defines the basic functionality for every node in a resolution proof tree. The AbstractSolutionNode allows for the traversal of the and/or graph used during proof construction. Proof trees are implemented as continuations and this class is designed to reflect that.
    Author:
    recardona
